fields.name: Company1 Standard Offer Letter
fields.content:
Dear {{FullName}},
{{CompanyName}} is pleased to offer you the position of {{Title}} with a starting salary of {{Salary}} per year, with a sttarting date of {{StartDate}}. {{CompanyName}} also offers a generous benefits package. Welcome to the {{CompanyName}} Team!

Sincerely,
Mafalda Hopkirk
VP of Human Resources

fields.name: Company1 Standard Employee Agreement
fields.content: You, {{FullName}}, agree to follow the policies of {{CompanyName}}. You agree not to talk about the business of {{CompanyName}} with anyone outside of {{CompanyName}}.
